div.h1:
Coronado Elementary School
Preparing every student for life and success beyond high school

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

td.div:
Welcome
At Coronado, we embrace diversity and provide our students with real world opportunities.
Coronado is a perfect representation of Amarillo. Our students, staff, and parents collectively embrace one anothers diversity. Students from all walks of life can expect to feel valued, encouraged, and challenged academically.
We are a Title I school that strives to provide opportunities that allow our students to be thinkers, communicators, collaborators, and contributors. Leadership positions encourage students to apply for and hold various roles throughout the school. University Interscholastic League competitions and activities provide academic extensions for our students.
At Coronado, staff, students, and parents work together to provide a positive, enriching education. We are committed to every students success.
If there is anything we can do for you or your student, please feel free to contact the school office at 806-326-4250.
Bria Galt
Principal, Coronado Elementary School
Preparing every student for life and success beyond high school

div.h2: Parents and Schools In Sync: Elementary

div.p: From creating special moments that bring emotional and social growth to sharing the tools and support to reach those big, early learning milestones, Parents and Schools In Sync is here to help us do it together. Be part of the conversation and join our Facebook Group (must be logged into Facebook to view).

iframe.style: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;

div.p: Subscribe to Peachjar eflyers (Opens in new window), you can have access to school flyers on your computer and mobile devices. View Coronados Peachjar eflyers (Opens in new window).
